ComicInfo.Summary: Titans Hunt, Chapter Two: Trouble Always Finds Me: Roy tries to escape police custody after being startled by a mysterious figure, as Gnarrk heads out to hunt, and Karen discovers something odd in a picture of Mal. Meanwhile Dick Grayson comes up with a plan to attract the attention of Garth, but their meeting is interrupted.
